itemDisplayName: Deploy a SQL database server with Threat Detection
description: This template allows you to deploy a SQL database server with Advanced Threat Protection enabled (primarily Threat Detection). Threat Detection is part of the SQL Advanced Threat Protection (ATP) offering and provides a layer of security that responds to potential threats over SQL servers and databases. For more information on Threat Detection: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sql-database/sql-database-threat-detection.
summary: Deploy a SQL database server with Threat Detection
